prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jackson and Haynes Ledger, 1890-1891. Local Government Records Collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia in a transfer of court papers from Scott County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Jackson and Haynes Ledger, 1890-1891, was used as evidence in the chancery cause, Thomas R. Jackson versus Samuel Haynes, etc., heard in the Circuit Court of Scott County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Jackson and Haynes Ledger, 1890-1891, records the accounts of lumber bought and sold by the partnership.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: For additional information see the Scott County Chancery Cause, Thomas R. Jackson versus Samuel Haynes, etc. It can be found in the Chancery Records Index at the Library of Virginia web site. The index number is 1897-030.
